name: Edge of Zenith
description:
Please take some time to read over the Known in-game issues before playing.

Edge of Zenith is a student project made in the spring of 2021 by:

Programmer: Bror Emil Nydalen

Animator: Kacper Oskar Zaremba

3D Generalist: Judy Helene Fagernes

Lead concept artist/Environment design: Anita Sletten

Concept artist/UI design: Mailynn Tran

Music composer: Ida H. Bergesen

____________________________________________________________________________

Story:

A cursed mercenary is tasked to activate an ancient tower filled with monsters, while he slowly realizes that there is a mysterious connection between the tower and his curse.

____________________________________________________________________________

How To launch the game:

Download the .Zip file

unpack the .Zip file

inside the WindowsNoEditor folder, launch the EdgeofZenith to launch game. 

If you encounter any issues when launching the game please check that your graphic card driver is up to date.

Game Controls:

Use the following controller guide to navigate and control the player character:

WASD - move the character

Left Mouse Button - attack

Space - dash

Q, E and R - use abilities

H - skip level (cheat button, please use this if stuck or too difficult)

To quit the game:

on windows: alt + f4

(on Mac: cmd + w)?

There is no controller support for this game.

____________________________________________________________________________

Known in-game issues/ missing items:

The game does not have an option for v-syn and you might experience some screen tearing.
